snippet.title: Elevator Down Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Ever wonderd how Souls are Judged in the Afterlife?
Well... that's your new job!

Judge the Fate of the Dead in this satirical, bureaucratic, decision-making game. Talk to Souls, check their documents, reference Holy Texts and decide if they're going Up or Down. Follow the rules or trust your own moral compass and see where your choices take you - hopefully not the Elevator Down.

Wishlist Elevator Down TODAY on Steam: https://www.bit.ly/elevator_down
Voice Acting by the gorgeous @TheJan 
Designed and Developed by eNVy softworks
Are you a journalist? Here's our presskit: https://www.bit.ly/elevator-presskit
